sentences.sContent: A: We can go sightseeing during the day.
sentences.sContent_eng: A: We can go sightseeing during the day.

sentences.sContent: Many tourists go sightseeing in those places.
sentences.sCn: 许多旅游者才去那些地方观光浏览。

sentences.sContent: Ben: Right I think I’ll go sightseeing today.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ben: Right I think I’ll go sightseeing today.
sentences.sCn: 好。 今天我打算去观光。
